body: This large crook of sharpened metal makes it easy to trip and catch fleeing opponents. Invented by ogres, most ogre hooks are Large and crudely fashioned—often from metal torn from previous victims' weapons and armor. Despite their poor workmanship, the rarity and peril involved in getting ogre hooks make such items quite valuable.
name: Ogre Hook
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Ogre Hook
